mod.name: FGO Abigail
mod.description: Adds the character Abigail Williams from Fate/Grand Order. Artwork is original art from the game and art and memes I found on danbooru. Upon artists request they will be changed. Check out ThorW on twitch.tv.

X can only go up to 3.

relics.name: Salem Diary
relics.description: Whenever you play a card, gain Madness equal to the energy spent.
relics.flavorText: The one born under the curse of the old ones can acquire just a bit of comfort on reading those pages.

relics.name: Metalized Insanity
relics.description: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block for every stack of Keyhole

relics.name: Cosmo's Battery
relics.description: Increase the maximum stacks of Keyholes to 4.

relics.name: Yog's Blessing
relics.description: Madness threshold to generate Qliphoth Rhizome is now 8. Start combat with 1 Keyhole.
relics.flavorText: In many places, it's considered a curse instead.

keywords.name: Keyhole
keywords.description: Gain [E] at the start of every turn for each stack of the buff, has an upper cap.

keywords.name: Keyitem
keywords.description: Exhaust on play, next turn add a copy of this card to your hand, it keeps upgrades but not cost changes.

keywords.name: Madness
keywords.description: Once you reach a threshold your Madness generates a powerful attack.
